[[File:The Hobbit commemorative booklet.png|thumb|275px|''The Hobbit 1937-2017'']]
This refers unofficially to two booklets that came with two certain editions of ''[[The Hobbit]]''. They are similar in format and content, containing miscellaneous things concerning ''The Hobbit''.

They most notably contain a lecture titled "[[Dragons (lecture)|Dragons]]" by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], which has not been published fully anywhere else.

==''The Hobbit 1937-2017''==
The first of these came with ''[[The Hobbit Facsimile Gift Edition]]'' box (ISBN 9780008259549) in [[2018]]. It has 62 pages, and has the following content:

* The History of ''The Hobbit''
* Publication
* Later Editions
* 'The Hoard' by J.R.R. Tolkien
* Lecture on Dragon
* 'Dragons' by J.R.R. Tolkien

==''Mathoms''==
[[File:The Hobbit Mathoms.jpg|thumb|275px|''Mathoms'']]
The booklet was again included in ''The Hobbit Illustrated by the Author'' deluxe slipcased edition (ISBN 9780008627836) in [[2023]]. it has 88 pages, containing one more section than the previous one.

* The History of ''The Hobbit''
* Thorin's letter to Bilbo*
* Publication
* Later Editions
* 'The Hoard' by J.R.R. Tolkien
* Lecture on Dragon
* 'Dragons' by J.R.R. Tolkien
